title: Don't miss this row house in a fantastic location on a quiet tree-line
description: Don't miss this row house in a fantastic location on a quiet tree-lined street with private rear yard and 2nd floor deck. The large patio has lots of plants, flowers and entertaining space. Upstairs there is a private deck off the master bedroom. The upper floor offers a spacious Primary Bedroom suite with a stained glass skylight, and ensuite bath w/ laundry. The living room features a cozy fireplace and exposed brick wall that follows from the entry of the home all the way up to the Primary Suite. The finished basement offers an office/guest room complete with a half bath. The house has been well maintained and updates have been completed such as new roof, new A/C unit, and basement storage area repointed. Enjoy convenient bus service to all of downtown Philadelphia; close proximity to theaters, concert venues, restaurants, and the business district with its offices and shopping. Close to Rittenhouse Square, Fitler Square and the River Walk area as well as the dog park. Many local eateries with a variety of food choices. Make your appointment today!

title: The Philadelphian is the most well known high rise on the Parkway. The
description: The Philadelphian is the most well known high rise on the Parkway. The location directly across the street from the Art Museum allows the residents to be right in the heart of many activities. The Eagles Celebration, Breast Cancer Walk, Made in America Concert and July 4th fireworks are all at your doorsteps. This bright 16th floor unit has a wonderful NW view. You will enjoy the evening sunsets from the large balcony. The spacious living room will provide ample space to entertain. You are within two blocks from Boat House Row, the new Whole Foods and many shops and restaurants on Fairmount Avenue. All utilities, basic cable, a 24 hour doorman and concierge, free condo bus around the city six days a week are all included in the association fee. The commercial corridor includes a pharmacy, bank, restaurant, grocery store and more. Everything you need is just an elevator away.

title: Welcome to Parc Rittenhouse, a wonderfully designed, amenity-filled co
description: Welcome to Parc Rittenhouse, a wonderfully designed, amenity-filled condominium which manages to marry the Old World charm of the neighborhood and modern aesthetic and conveniences required for today's savvy buyer. Located on the east corner of Philadelphia's celebrated Rittenhouse Square, the location is second to none. The prized square dates back to the late 17th century as one of the five original open space parks designed by William Penn. Its lush grass, canopy of trees and benches serve as a gathering spot during all seasons and the Paul Cret designed entrances and fountain are works of art. The grandeur of the building is felt immediately upon entering as you step into a lovely lobby with a fireplace and sweeping views of the park and are greeted by a concierge. The beautifully appointed turn-key residence has been professionally decorated and includes all furnishings. The living room boasts hardwood floors and a freshly painted interior with modern, muted hues. The kitchen features bright white cabinets, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a washer/dryer. The bedroom is cozy with wall-to-wall carpeting and a large closet and the full bathroom boasts a tile floor and marble vanity. As a resident of Parc Rittenhouse, you'll enjoy a twenty-four hour doorman, a club room, boardroom, media room, owners' lounge with adjoining theater and anchoring the ground floor, Stephen Starr's Parc and Devon Seafood Grill. A magnificently landscaped rooftop sun deck with outdoor pool and spa and a state-of-the-art fitness center round out the spectacular amenities

title: Fairmount Apartment for RENT - 2 Bed 1 Bath
description: Nicely renovated and well maintained two bedroom home located on a quiet, tree-lined street in the Fairmount neighborhood, available for rent mid-November. First floor open floor plan with hardwood floors throughout, beautiful exposed brick in the dining area and great natural light. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, tiled backsplash, great cabinet and counter space, and a nook with room for two stools. Just off the kitchen is a private patio with room for a table and grill. Upstairs features two bedrooms, a full bathroom and hardwood floors. The spacious main bedroom has a large closet, exposed brick and a ceiling fan. The guest bedroom has room comfortably fits a full bed and features a closet (could also be perfect for home office!). The recently updated bathroom has a marble top vanity with storage and subway tile surrounding the full tub. The unfinished basement is great for storage and houses the washer and dryer. Central air, radiator heat. Located on a quiet, tree-lined street, easy street parking. Quick access to 76, Kelly Drive and the Schuylkill River Trail. Five minute walk to Fairmount Ave, close to local favorites like Black Taxi, Lucky Goat, Brown Street Coffee, A Mano, as well as Aldi and Whole Foods.

title: Unique 3-story loft in quiet Philadelphia! -- 600 E Thompson St
description:
Have you heard about the newly-renovated luxury residences available at 600 E Thompson St. in downtown Philadelphia? This 3-story boutique building has 13 gorgeous apartments, including alcove studios, 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom units, with rent starting at $780. Plus, each apartment comes with a convenient parking spot!
Inside each apartment, you'll find brand new features like vinyl plank flooring, granite countertops, modern shaker cabinets, stainless steel appliances, updated showers, fresh paint, and modern lighting and plumbing fixtures. And with walkable parks, retail, and restaurants surrounding the building, you'll never run out of things to do.
Just keep in mind that tenants are responsible for paying all utilities, including water, sewer, trash, and electric. However, you'll stay cool in the summer thanks to central air conditioning, and the building is equipped with a security camera system for added peace of mind. Plus, coin-operated laundry is available on-site, and you can take advantage of on-site parking as well. One thing to note, though, is that this is a NON-SMOKING apartment.

title: 2-bed, 1-bath Home Features 2 Outdoor Spaces & Beautifully Modern Comf
description:
Situated on a quiet, sweet street in Washington Square West, 410 S Iseminger ticks all the boxes of trinity living. This two-bedroom, one-bathroom home features TWO outdoor spaces and has been beautifully updated for both modern comfort and historic preservation. Just through the front door, you’re greeted with a quaint living room with a well-maintained original fireplace and coat closet. Making your way downstairs, you’ll find the renovated kitchen with cellar door access to the street (for unloading groceries) and outdoor space. The kitchen has all new appliances, a new backsplash, and repointed exposed brick walls. The back patio is the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or work outside during a warm day. The first bedroom is found on the second floor of the home. Down the hall is the full bath featuring heated floors, a new toilet, and a new vanity. On the third floor of this trinity is the second bedroom with beautiful vaulted ceilings and exposed beams. Off of this bedroom is a little balcony. With two outdoor spaces, original hardwood floors, a basement for storage, central air, and close proximity to all your Center City favorites, you will LOVE living on Iseminger.
410 S Iseminger St

title: Discover this charming property in Philadelphia!!
description:
Center City West is a neighborhood within Center City, the downtown district of Philadelphia. This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods. The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Nearby Rittenhouse Square is a popular spot for festivals and farmers markets while the Schuylkill Banks has excellent riverside running and biking trails with a view.
105 S 18th Street S #5C

title: Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home!
description:
Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home! This stunning newly constructed building is situated in the heart of Philadelphia and offers six units of modern luxury living. Unit #301 is a beautiful 2 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom apartment, boasting ample natural light and a private roof deck for your relaxation and enjoyment. Each unit in the building comes equipped with top-notch security features, including front door security cameras, alarm systems, and smart home intercom systems. You'll also enjoy a range of high-tech amenities, such as Nest thermostats, remote-controlled range hoods, rain shower heads, and garbage disposals. Inside your apartment, you'll be greeted by desirable features such as white oak hardwood floors, recessed lighting, central air conditioning, and in-unit laundry facilities. The kitchen is a chef's dream, with navy and white cabinetry, stunning quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas range, and double-door refrigerator. The bedrooms are spacious and come with ample closet space, while the bathrooms boast unique tiling, floating wood vanities, and glass shower doors. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to live in the lap of luxury in Philadelphia. Schedule your tour today before it's too late!
1343 Fitzwater St #301

title: Welcome to the Vine, Luxury Condo Located in the Heart of Francisville
description:
Welcome to The Vine, the newest luxury condo development by Philadelphia’s premier developer, Stamm Development, located in the heart of Francisville, just north of bustling Fairmount Avenue. This gorgeous unit boasts an open layout with a large kitchen featuring plenty of cabinet and countertop space, a bright and airy living room, and a huge bedroom. With its large 11’ ceilings, 1A feels wide open and spacious. The kitchen is the heart of this home and is decked out with two-tone UltraCraft cabinets, pure white quartz countertops, Delta Trinsic matte black fixtures, and Whirlpool stainless steel appliances, making it a chef's dream come true. The generously appointed bedroom features custom-built closets, while the bathroom boasts a deep soaking tub, custom vanity, and sleek black matte fixtures. Modern conveniences such as smart thermostats and Latch Technology secured front entry systems are included in all residences, providing an added layer of security and convenience. The building also features an incredible rooftop deck for all residents to enjoy, a private trash/recycling room, bike storage, and a mail room.

description:

Your living room welcomes you home with a sun-soaked atmosphere and a decorative fireplace with mantle and built-in shelving. title: New fitness center, Elevator building, Beautiful courtyards
description: Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: You'll Fall In Love With All The Charming Details In This 4B Unit!!
description:
Beautiful 4B/2B apartment! This unit offers a private entrance to newly renovated unit. Modern kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Newly ceramic tile floors and carpeted bedrooms. Four spacious bedrooms, all with great closet space. Some rooms offer a "bonus room" which can be used as an office or additional storage. Some bedrooms offer walk-in closets. Individually controlled central heating and air conditioning. Unit includes washer/dryer. Cats are welcome (add'l fee)! Apartment is rented unfurnished.
Chancellor Apartments is a convenient high rise apartment community in an amazing location in Center City. We are close to most major schools and universities, public transportation, historical attractions, shopping, restaurants and theaters. Center City at its best!!
Rent includes: Water, 24-hour front desk attendant, free bike storage room, package acceptance service, 24-hour emergency maintenance service, BuildingLink resident services portal access for all residents.
The Chancellor boasts several different studio and one bedroom floor plans. Apartments feature high ceilings, large bright windows, ceiling fans in most units, hardwood floors and breathtaking views of the Philadelphia skyline and Delaware River. Many apartments have large walk-in closets, too!
We have partnered with Optimal Sport Health Club to offer a generous discounted gym membership (we pay your initiation fee!). There are several off street parking lots and garages in the area, too!

The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to retail stores, grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, Vans, Tselaine, Anthropologie, Lagos, Madewell, Outdoor Voices, Tiffany & Co., Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Target, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Rittenhouse Market, Target, Maxx's Produce, Food & Friends, Spruce Market, Trader Joe's, and Giant. Dine out at Pietro's, Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Via Locusta, Schlesinger's, Spice Finch, Bellini, La Fontana della Citta, a.kitchen, HipCity Veg, Zama, Restaurant Aleksandar, Villekebabs & Platters, Her Place, Veda, Wilder Restaurant, Tortorice's Specialty Sandwiches, Twenty Manning, Square on Square, Friday Saturday Sunday, and Trattoria Carina. Enjoy a churro sundae at El Merkury. Pick up a loaf of bread from Metropolitan Bakery. View the collection at The Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 1710 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Schedule an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, the chatbot concierge, at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Check out our Facebook page for upcoming resident and local events!
Rittenhouse Claridge
Price is for the 22 month lease term. For an unfurnished home, 2 to 22 month lease terms are available! Price depends upon lease term and move-in date. Check out our website for current pricing!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
We can furnish a home for you over two weeks following rental application approval and after the home is made ready. Please note that there is a three-month lease term minimum for a furnished home. You would pay a furnished rent, which we will calculate for you.
Welcome home!
